titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel GUSTO.

bill.summary: 9/27/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
